channel.title: Vinyl on Geekosaur

item.title: Vinyl Record Pre-Orders [Feb. 15 2020]
item.description: This year I decided to invest a bit ore in my record collection and gradually expand it. I’ve been spending less on Uber Eats, and directing some of that saved money on music. Still, this is not a big list, as I don’t pre-order much. Maybe I should? Considering the price usually goes up after release, it’s actually a good idea.
